message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your business operations. Let's start by discussing the value we can create together. My initial offer for the product is $1500000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, my budget is quite limited. I am willing to pay up to $1200000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
